name: Homeopath in London
body: # Homeopathy in London Hello, my name is Theresa Bottomley and I am homeopath based in London. ## My rates I charge £50/hour. This does not include travel to your location. ## My qualifications I am fully-qualified and accredited by the British Homeopathy Association
